title: Creamy Sago Pudding
directions: Place water into saucepan and bring to the boil.
Add the sago. Simmer until water is absorbed.
Add milk and salt, stir well and leave over moderate heat until mixture begins to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer gently for approximately 20 minutes until mixture is creamy.
Blend custard powder and cold milk together, add to sago mixture.
Continue to stir, add sugar and cook until bubbling gently.
Pour into serving dish and sprinkle with cinnamon.
